Summary: "Stars" that went from bright to nothing
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Visalia
There were no other sightings in Visalia on or around October 1st 2005
divs: Sighting Details1. In my driveway cleaning my barbecue. 2. I just happened to look north, slightly up. 3. There were two equally bright "stars", one directly above the other that I didn't recall seeing before. They did not seem to be moving. 4. Two equally bright "stars" that were in a vertical line. As I was looking at them, the bottom one slowly dimmed until I couldn't see it anymore. Then the top one did the same thing. About an hour later the same thing happened but there was only one "star" this time. 5. I just stood there thinking that stars shouldn't do that. I didn't think they were aircraft as I couldn't see a green or red light attached to them as an aircraft would. 6. As I said, they slowly dimmed until I couldn't see them.
